paper_title: Relative pluripotential theory on compact Kähler manifolds
abstract: Given a compact Kähler manifold, we survey the study of complex Monge-Ampère type equations with prescribed singularity type, developed by the authors in a series of papers. In addition, we give a general answer to a question of Guedj--Zeriahi about the finite energy range of the complex Monge-Ampère operator.
